title: IdMeSuperEgo
description: The story takes place in a fictional european country that is teetering on the brink of both complete anarchy and complete totalitarianism. It is a political, societal, and (most of all) philosophical odyssey. The story is told 1st person by the main character Louie Gallagher, a vulgar, poetic, disillusioned, and mentally unstable person. The reader follows his life as he experiences death, drugs, cultural shifts and social revolutions.
author: Ian James Lohrman
